Title: Forgot to Pre-Order an iPhone 16e? Apple Store Pickup Available Today at Most Locations
Description:
Apple's new entry-level iPhone 16e are now being delivered to customers worldwide following the pre-order period that began on Friday, February 21.
For those who didn't pre-order or chose to wait, the devices are currently readily available, and select Apple …

Title: 6 Reasons Home Prices Won't Go Down, According to This Realtor
Description: Nothing is going to make home prices drop significantly in the near future.

Title: Why the U.S. wants Ukraine's minerals. And AOC speaks with NPR's Steve Inskeep
Description:
Trump and Zelenskyy are expected to meet today in Washington, D.C., to sign a preliminary deal.
And, AOC tells NPR why she believes the government only works for the wealthy.

Title: Meeting Trump at White House, Zelenksyy hopes for continued aid in war with Russia
Description: It's the first face-to-face meeting between Zelenskyy and Trump since Trump's inauguration, and it comes about a week after Trump called Zelenskyy a dictator and repeated Kremlin talking points, including suggesting that Ukraine started the war with Russia.

Title: The CFPB drops its lawsuit against Capital One, marking a major reversal
Description: The consumer protection agency also dropped cases against four other companies including Rocket Homes.

Title: I'm 92 and work full-time. I'm not ready to retire — I still love teaching.
Description:
Jerry Cascio-Hitchcock has been a full-time teacher for 60 years and works with children with learning disabilities.
She doesn't plan to retire soon.

Title: How Amazon used Oreos and dog toys to develop an army of robots to grab what you buy
Description:
Google self-driving cars emerged from the DARPA Grand Challenge.
Amazon's powerful picking robots were inspired by a similar competition a decade ago.

Title: Released ‘Epstein Files’ Disappoint Anticipators. A Republican ‘Rickroll’ Didn’t Help
Description:
The heavily redacted files proved disappointing.
A GOP Judiciary Committee “rickroll” during the anticipation of the release didn’t make people feel any better.

Title: Palworld Dev Pocketpair Gives Employees Monster Hunter Wilds Launch Day Off After Receiving ‘Mysterious’ Notes From Staff Who Said They’d Probably Be Too Unwell to Work
Description: The developer of Palworld has given its staff the day off to play Monster Hunter Wilds after receiving a number of “mysterious” notices from employees who claimed they would “probably be feeling unwell” and unable to work.

Title: Unlimited 5G for $50? T-Mobile Prepaid Plans bring big value to everyone
Description:
T-Mobile / T-Mobile Tired of sky-high phone bills and sluggish network speeds? T-Mobile has the solution: Unlimited 5G data, talk, and text starting at just $50 per month (plus taxes and fees).
That’s right — you can now get all the 5G you need on the fastest…

Title: Apple is late to Siri revolution, so Microsoft brings you Copilot for Mac
Description: The Copilot app for Mac comes with its own quick-launch keyboard shortcut, supports multi-modal input, and the latest AI tricks such as Think Deeper mode.

Title: World’s thinnest phone is here, but it’s not the iPhone 17 Air or Galaxy S25 Edge
Description:
Tecno has announced the Spark Slim, which measures only 5.75mm across.
Despite that, it packs a massive battery, dual 50–megapixel cameras, and a 144Hz panel.

Title: 3 underrated Amazon Prime Video movies you should watch this weekend (February 28 – March 2)
Description: These three movies are the perfect way to spend a quiet weekend evening, and should be good regardless of what kind of movie you're looking for.

Title: Notorious Mexican drug lord among 29 extradited to US

Title: Why Do Songs Get Stuck in Your Head?
Description: Some songs get stuck in our head more than others, and scientists have uncovered what makes them so irresistible.

Title: Do Aliens Know We’re Here?
Description: Whether aliens could detect our modern civilization depends on what signs they’re looking for—and, crucially, their distance from us
